text: I think James F Dalton summarises this concept of a certain uncertainty quite nicely.
To be successful, you have to become a lifelong student of the game, immersed in the markets
with an open mind and an inquisitive spirit.
Of course you can also choose to be a spectator, someone who knows a lot of interesting
facts able to recite all kinds of statistics.
Spectators can't play the game. The difference between a spectator and you
who wants to become a trader is whether or not you have the ability and the
mindset to be able to take the necessary risk to achieve the probable
